name: trueword
0:
”Alexa ask true word to say a verse”
”Alexa ask true word for a verse”
”Alexa ask true word to chose a verse”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true word
des:
Just ask true word for a verse and Alexa will select a verse from the bible and read it for you.
A good way to start the day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
